description.german: Besiege 1.000 Monster im Zustand des Erwachens.
description.italian: Sconfiggi 1000 mostri nello stato di Risveglio.

description.english: Defeat an elite patrol enemy on each of the four Elemental Continents.
description.german: Besiegt einen Elite-Patrouillenfeind auf jedem der vier Elementarkontinente.
description.french: Éliminez un ennemi de la patrouille d'élite sur chacun des quatre continents élémentaires.

description.koreana: 각각의 네 요소 대륙에서 순찰 정예 적을 처치한다.
description.spanish: Derrota a un enemigo de patrulla de élite en cada uno de los cuatro Continentes Elementales.
description.schinese: 分别在四个元素大陆击杀一次巡逻精英敌人
description.tchinese: 分別在四個元素大陸擊殺一次巡邏精英敵人

description.russian: Попасть по 100 врагам с помощью [Сейсмический удар].

description.russian: Попасть по 100 врагам с помощью [Воздушный удар].
description.japanese: [地裂山崩]で100匹の敵に命中。

description.german: Führe [Kontinuierliches Tranchieren] für mehr als 30 Sekunden aus.
description.french: Exécutez [Tranchage continu] pendant plus de 30 secondes.
description.spanish: Continúa [Corte Continuo] por más de 30 segundos.
description.russian: Продолжать [Непрерывное Резание] в течение более 30 секунд.
description.japanese: [切断]を30秒以上続ける。
description.brazilian: Mantenha [Corte Contínuo] por mais de 30 segundos.

description.english: Consecutively replicate Dimension Slash 10 times or more with [Speed Stab].
description.german: Wiederhole [Dimensionsbecher] mit [Geschwindigkeitsstich] 10 Mal oder mehr hintereinander.
description.french: Répétez consécutivement 10 fois ou plus Taillade dimensionnelle avec [Entaille éclair].
description.italian: Replica [Taglio Dimensionale] 10 volte o più con [Affondo Rapido].
description.koreana: [신속 찌르기]로 차원 베기 10회 이상 연속 복제한다.
description.spanish: Replica consecutivamente [Corte Dimensional] 10 veces o más con [Puñalada veloz].
description.schinese: 【极速刺杀】连续复制次元斩超过10秒
description.tchinese: 【極速刺殺】連續複製次元斬超過10秒
description.russian: Непрерывно выполнить измерительный разрез более 10 раз с помощью [Скоростной удар].
description.japanese: [神速突き]で次元斬りを10回以上連続で複製。
description.turkish: [Hızlı Bıçaklama] ile boyut kesimini ardışık olarak 10 kez veya daha fazla tekrar et.
description.brazilian: Repita o [Corte Dimensional] 10 vezes ou mais com [Apunhalada Ligeira].

description.english: Keep spinning for over 30 seconds continuously with [Whirlwind Strike].
description.german: Führe [Windschlag] mit dem Kreisel für mehr als 30 Sekunden aus.
description.french: Faites la toupie pendant plus de 30 secondes avec [Frappe du vent].
description.italian: Mantieni la rotazione per oltre 30 secondi con [Colpo di Turbine].
description.spanish: Sigue girando durante más de 30 segundos continuamente con [Golpe de Torbellino].
description.russian: Поддерживать вращение более 30 секунд с помощью [Вихревой удар].
description.japanese: [旋風斬り]を30秒以上連続で回転させる。
description.turkish: [Kasırga Vuruşu] ile sürekli olarak 30 saniyeden fazla dönmeye devam et.
description.brazilian: Mantenha a rotação por mais de 30 segundos com [Golpe de Tornado].

description.english: Hit 6 enemies at once with a single [Charged Blow]..
description.german: Treffe gleichzeitig 6 Feinde mit einem einzigen [Geladener Schlag].
description.french: Touchez 6 ennemis à la fois en un seul [Coup Chargé].
description.italian: Colpisci 6 nemici contemporaneamente con una singola [Attacco Caricato].
description.spanish: Golpea a 6 enemigos a la vez con un solo [Ataque Cargado].
description.schinese: 【蓄力重击】单次技能同时击中6个敌人
description.tchinese: 【蓄力重擊】單次技能同時擊中6個敵人
description.japanese: [チャージ強攻撃]で単一のスキルで6匹の敵に同時に命中。
description.turkish: Tek bir [Yüklü Saldırı] ile aynı anda 6 düşmanı vur.
description.brazilian: Acerte 6 inimigos de uma só vez com um único [Ataque Carregado].

description.english: Accumulate 100 shield generations with the [Spiral Strike] and [Lethal Counterattack].
description.french: Accumulez 100 générations de bouclier avec [Frappe spiralée] et [Contre-attaque létale].
description.italian: Accumula 100 generazioni di scudi con [Colpo a Spirale] e [Contrattacco Letale].
description.spanish: Acumula 100 generaciones de escudos con [Golpe giratorio] y [Contraataque letal].
description.schinese: 【螺旋斩】【致命反击】累计生成100次护盾
description.tchinese: 【螺旋斬】【致命反擊】累計生成100次護盾
description.russian: Накопить 100 щитов с помощью [Спиральный удар] и [Смертельная контратака].
description.japanese: [螺旋斬]と[致命反撃]で100回の盾生成を積む。
description.turkish: [Sarmal Vuruş] ve [Ölümcül Karşı Saldırı] ile 100 kalkan oluştur.
description.brazilian: Acumule 100 gerações de escudos com [Rodopio] e [Contra-ataque Letal].

description.japanese: [致命反撃]を50回トリガーする。

description.spanish: Activa 100 explosiones mágicas con [Mejora de Esquiva].
description.schinese: 【闪避强化】累计触发100次魔法爆炸
description.tchinese: 【閃避強化】累計觸發100次魔法爆炸
description.russian: Активировать 100 магических взрывов с помощью [Усиление уклонения].
description.japanese: [回避強化]を100回で魔法的爆発をトリガーする。
description.brazilian: Dispare 100 explosões mágicas com [Aprimoramento de Esquiva].

description.english: Strike a total of 200 enemies with [Arrow Rain].
description.french: Frappez un total de 200 ennemis avec [Pluie de flèches].
description.italian: Colpisci un totale di 200 nemici con [Pioggia di Frecce].
description.spanish: Golpea a un total de 200 enemigos con [Lluvia de Flechas].
description.russian: Попасть по 200 врагам с помощью [Дождь стрел].
description.japanese: [矢の雨]で200匹の敵に命中。
description.brazilian: Atinja um total de 200 inimigos com [Chuva de Flechas].

description.english: Accumulate 100 uses of Ultimates (Ultimate Ability - Flame Flurry, Ultimate Ability - Stonebreaker, Ultimate Ability - Cluster Burst, Awakening)
description.german: Sammle 100 Anwendungen göttlicher Fertigkeiten (Ultimative Fähigkeit - Flammenwirbel, Ultimative Fähigkeit - Steinbrecher, Ultimative Fähigkeit - Gruppenexplosion, Erwachen).
description.french: Accumulez 100 utilisations de compétence divine (Capacité ultime - Furie de flammes, Capacité ultime - Briseroche, Capacité ultime - Décharge groupée, Éveil)
description.italian: Accumula 100 utilizzi di [Ultime] (Abilità Finale - Vortice Fiammeggiante, Abilità Finale - Spezza Montagne, Abilità Finale - Mitragliatrice Selvaggia, Risveglio).
description.koreana: (최종 능력 - 불의 분노, 최종 능력 - 바위 깨기, 최종 능력 - 클러스터 버스트, 각성)을 100회 사용한다.
description.spanish: Acumula 100 usos de habilidades definitivas (Habilidad definitiva - Ráfaga Llameante, Habilidad definitiva - Rompepiedras, Habilidad definitiva - Explosión de racimo, Despertar).
description.schinese: 累计使用100次神技（神技·焰流乱舞、神技·岩破、神技·暴烈霰射、觉醒）
description.tchinese: 累計使用100次神技（神技·焰流亂舞、神技·岩破、神技·暴烈霰射、覺醒）
description.russian: Накопить 100 использований Ультимативных способностей (Максимальная способность - Пламенный шквал, Максимальная способность - Камнелом, Максимальная способность - Кластерный взрыв, Пробуждение).
description.japanese: 神技（神技・焔流乱舞、神技・岩砕、神技・五月雨撃ち、覚醒）を100回使用する。
description.turkish: Nihai yeteneklerin 100 kullanımını biriktir (Nihai Yetenek - Alev Fırtınası, Nihai Yetenek - Taş Kıran, Nihai Yetenek - Küme Patlaması, Uyanış).
description.brazilian: Acumule 100 usos de Super Habilidades (Habilidade Suprema - Saraivada Abrasadora, Habilidade Suprema - Quebra-pedra, Habilidade Suprema - Disparo Agrupado, Despertar).

description.japanese: すべての武器を収集する。

description.english: Fully socket any piece of equipment with runestones.
description.german: Vollständig bestücke ein beliebiges Ausrüstungsteil mit Runensteinen.

description.italian: Inserisci pietre runiche in qualsiasi pezzo di equipaggiamento.

description.russian: Полностью вставить рунные камни в любую часть экипировки.

description.english: Find all pieces of the Blank Stele.
description.french: Trouvez tous les morceaux de la Stèle vierge.
description.italian: Trova tutti i pezzi del Stele Bianca.
description.spanish: Encuentra todas las piezas de la Estela en Blanco.
description.japanese: すべての無字碑の欠片を見つける。
description.turkish: Boş Dikili Taşın tüm parçalarını bul.
description.brazilian: Encontre todas as peças do Stele em Branco.

description.french: Terminez toutes les ruines souterraines 1 étoile.
description.italian: Completa tutte le rovine sotterranee 1 stelle.
description.spanish: Limpia todas las ruinas subterráneas de 1 estrella.
description.japanese: すべての1星の地下遺跡をクリアする。
description.brazilian: Limpe todas as ruínas subterrâneas de 1 estrela.

description.french: Terminez toutes les ruines souterraines 2 étoiles.
description.italian: Completa tutte le rovine sotterranee 2 stelle.
description.spanish: Limpia todas las ruinas subterráneas de 2 estrellas.
description.japanese: すべての2星の地下遺跡をクリアする。
description.brazilian: Limpe todas as ruínas subterrâneas de 2 estrelas.

description.french: Terminez toutes les ruines souterraines 3 étoiles.
description.italian: Completa tutte le rovine sotterranee 3 stelle.
description.spanish: Limpia todas las ruinas subterráneas de 3 estrellas.
description.japanese: すべての3星の地下遺跡をクリアする。
description.brazilian: Limpe todas as ruínas subterrâneas de 3 estrelas.

description.english: Open all chests in underground ruins.
description.german: Alle Truhen in den unterirdischen Ruinen öffnen.
description.french: Ouvrez tous les coffres des ruines souterraines.
description.italian: Apri tutte le bauli nelle rovine sotterranee.
description.spanish: Abre todos los cofres en las ruinas subterráneas.
description.schinese: 开启所有地下遗迹的宝箱
description.tchinese: 開啟所有地下遺跡的寶箱
description.russian: Открыть все сундуки в подземных руинах.
description.japanese: 地下遺跡のすべての宝箱を開ける。
description.brazilian: Abra todas as caixas nas ruínas subterrâneas.

description.german: Schließe eine 3-Sterne Ruine in 3 Minuten ab.
description.french: Terminez une ruine 3 étoiles en 3 minutes.
description.italian: Completa qualsiasi rovina 3 stelle entro 3 minuti.
description.spanish: Limpia cualquier ruina de 3 estrellas en 3 minutos.
description.japanese: 任意の1つの3星遺跡を3分以内でクリアする。
description.turkish: Herhangi bir 3 yıldızlı kalıntıyı 3 dakika içinde temizle.
description.brazilian: Limpe qualquer ruína de 3 estrelas em 3 minutos.

description.english: Defeat any boss without using any consumables.
description.german: Besiege einen beliebigen Boss, ohne Verbrauchsmaterialien zu verwenden.
description.french: Éliminez n'importe quel boss sans utiliser de consommables.
description.italian: Sconfiggi un qualsiasi capo senza utilizzare alcun consumabile.
description.koreana: 모든 보급품을 사용하지 않고 임의의 보스를 격파한다.
description.spanish: Derrota a cualquier jefe sin usar consumibles.
description.schinese: 不使用任何补给品的情况下击败任意一个首领
description.tchinese: 不使用任何補給品的情況下擊敗任意一個首領
description.russian: Победить любого босса без использования каких-либо расходных материалов.
description.japanese: いかなる補給品も使わずに任意のボスを倒す。
description.turkish: Herhangi bir patronu tüketim malzemesi kullanmadan yen.
description.brazilian: Derrote qualquer chefe sem usar nenhum consumível.

description.english: Defeat the Salamander King without breaking any eggs.
description.german: Besiege den Salamanderkönig, ohne ein Ei zu zerbrechen.
description.french: Éliminez le Roi salamandre sans détruire un seul œuf.
description.italian: Sconfiggi il Re Salamandra senza rompere alcun uovo.
description.koreana: 아무 알도 깨지 않고 킹 샐러맨더를 처치하십시오.
description.spanish: Derrota al Ajolote Real sin romper ningún huevo.
description.schinese: 不击破蝾螈卵的情况下击败蝾螈王
description.tchinese: 不擊破螈卵的情況下擊敗螈王
description.russian: Победить Королевскую Саламандру, не разбив ни одного яйца.
description.japanese: 蝾螈の卵を破らずにキングサラマンダーを倒す。
description.brazilian: Derrote o Rei Salamandra sem quebrar nenhum ovo.

description.english: Defeat the Armor Bear without breaking any beehives.
description.german: Besiege den Panzerbär, ohne einen Bienenstock zu zerstören.
description.french: Éliminez l'Ours-cuirasse sans détruire une seule ruche.
description.italian: Sconfiggi l'Orso Corazzato senza rompere alcun alveare.
description.koreana: 아무 벌집도 부수지 않고 무장곰을 처치하십시오.
description.spanish: Derrota al Oso acorazado sin romper ninguna colmena.
description.schinese: 不击破蜂巢的情况下击败铠熊
description.tchinese: 不擊破蜂巢的情況下擊敗鎧熊
description.russian: Победить Бронированного медведя, не разбив ни одного улья.
description.japanese: 蜂巣を破らずにヨロイグマを倒す。
description.brazilian: Derrote o Urso Armadurado sem quebrar nenhuma colmeia.

description.english: Finish off any boss with a [Lethal Counterattack].
description.german: Töte jeden Boss mit einem [Tödlicher Gegenangriff].
description.french: Éliminez n'importe quel boss avec une [Contre-attaque létale].
description.italian: Finisci un qualsiasi capo con un [Contrattacco Letale].
description.spanish: Termina con cualquier jefe con un [Contraataque letal].
description.schinese: 使用【致命反击】为最后一击击败任意首领
description.tchinese: 使用【致命反擊】為最後一擊擊敗任意首領
description.russian: Финишировать с помощью [Смертельная контратака] на любом боссе.
description.japanese: [致命反撃]で任意のボスを最後の一撃にする。
description.turkish: Herhangi bir patronu [Ölümcül Karşı Saldırı] ile bitir.
description.brazilian: Conclua qualquer chefe com um [Contra-ataque Letal].

description.japanese: すべての実績を達成する。
